# RadApes
![](upload://m5tNrGCER0XWNxu6S3lbUUDCyHF.gif)
> First and coolest apes on Radix! >RadApes is an NFT series featuring 10,000 AI-generated apes. RadApes are looking to make trouble on our DLT from January 2022 until we reach DAO singularity. Rad in looks and behaviour, these apes will stop for nobody. Stay hungry - stay apish ü¶ß üçå **Price of each NFT:** 50 XRD **Links:** * [Website](https://www.radapes.net/) Social: * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RadApes) * [Discord](https://discord.gg/xwum4MaJY9)

item.title: RadApes

item.description:
RadApes

First and coolest apes on Radix!

RadApes is an NFT series featuring 10,000 AI-generated apes. RadApes are looking to make trouble on our DLT from January 2022 until we reach DAO singularity. Rad in looks and behaviour, these apes will stop for nobody. Stay hungry - stay apish

Price of each NFT: 50 XRD

Links:

Social:
